attributes.action: We should make it legal to use mobile phones while driving
attributes.additional_details: please visit the petition campaign website at www.bentcop.boards.net for further information or the main petitions holding page at www.bentcop.biz
attributes.background: Mobile Phones are Legal to use while driving in many American states. We should make it legal to use mobile phones but create DRIVER LEARNING COURSES of SAFE USE with a licence or certificate.
